source.name: Selected Regional Judicial Officer Cases, 2005 - Present
source.description: This dataset contains selected cases involving EPA's Regional Judicial Officers (RJOs) from 2005 to present. EPA's Regional Judicial Officers (RJOs) perform adjudicatory functions and act as Agency neutrals in administrative cases. EPA's RJOs are senior attorneys with backgrounds in EPA enforcement, general law, or both.    It should be noted that this data set does not currently contain the complete set of RJO cases from 2005 to present, but rather a selected set of significant cases.  The complete set of cases is not yet currently available from EPA in an electronic format.  EPA's Regional Judicial Officers (RJOs) perform adjudicatory functions and act as Agency neutrals in administrative cases. EPA's RJOs are senior attorneys with backgrounds in EPA enforcement, general law, or both.
